message.content:
cs.CR, cs.DC, cs.SE, cs.Distributed, cs.PL 

This paper discusses the management of security credentials for scientific workflows, which is a topic related to computer security (cs.CR) and distributed computing (cs.DC). The paper also describes the design and implementation of the SciTokens system, which involves software engineering (cs.SE) and programming languages (cs.PL). Finally, the paper discusses the integration of SciTokens with widely-used software for distributed scientific computing, which is related to the field of distributed systems (cs.Distributed).
